thread.title: Viral CCTV Video: Doorbell Cam Catches Man’s Last-Minute Escape From Snake Attack
thread.title_full: Viral CCTV Video: Doorbell Cam Catches Man’s Last-Minute Escape From Snake Attack

author: @englishjagrannews
title: Viral CCTV Video: Doorbell Cam Catches Man’s Last-Minute Escape From Snake Attack
text: - By [Poorva Karki](/authors/poorva-karki) - Published: Fri, 29 Dec 2023 03:48 PM (IST) - Source:JND Viral CCTV Video: A man got lucky and went viral on social media after he managed to escape a deadly attack by a snake that was resting near the doorknob at the front door. The entire incident was captured on a doorbell camera, the video of which is currently doing rounds on social media over its ‘wildness’. In the video, the man was about to open the front door of a house, but immediately took his hand back after the snake hissed and attacked him. What went further viral about the clip was an adorable cat that was sitting on the front porch. The cat seemed aware of the snake’s presence, due to which it even tried to warn the man with a single ‘meow’. Netizens were quick to praise the feline for the ‘warning’. The video was shared on the social media platform Instagram, by the handle ‘Redneckmemes’. The post was captioned, “Exact response I’d have.” Watch the viral video: View this post on Instagram The video went viral in no time as people had a lot to say. Most found the incident scary and terrifying, while others loved the cat that tried to warn the man. Rest commented on what they would have done in the same situation where most agreed on running, and some pointed out that the snake was ‘harmless’. The video was shared a few days ago and pulled 143K likes from people. ALSO READ: [Viral Video: Woman Entres Gym With Painted Body To Get Reaction; Internet Is NOT Happy](https://english.jagran.com/viral/viral-video-woman-entres-gym-with-painted-body-to-get-reaction-internet-is-not-happy-watch-10123626) Taking to the comment section, people shared their take. “Cat: Meow MF DO YOU SEE THAT.. JERRRYYY!!!” a user commented. “The cat tried to warn him,” said a next. “Damn cat was trying to warn him,” said another. “He’s ju t warning you about your carssss extended warranty,” joked a fourth person. “I’d make two movements; a bowel movement and a physical movement, SH*T AND RUN!” wrote a fifth person. “The kitty tried to warm him. Let this be a lesson! If a cat says meow there may be danger,” added next. “It's actually just a black rat snake. Nonvenomous. No fans. The guy may have felt a pinch and gotten small scratches on his wrist. Although it was scary it's harmless,” said another.
